title: Front-End
description: Learn the frameworks needed to develop user interfaces on web and mobile platforms

title: Back-End
description: Learn the underlying systems that power the apps you interact with everyday

title: Hardware
description: Get down to the metal and learn how to use microcontrollers to solve challenging problems

title: Data Science
description: Experience the power of artificial intelligence and understand the fundamentals of machine learning

title: IT / Cybersecurity
description: Take on cloud computing and grasp the wonders of hacking and cybersecurity

title: Game Development
description: Write code to create games and virtual experiences, making stories and characters come to life
